alert.note: Alert for Essex; Middlesex; Norfolk; Plymouth; Suffolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 7:27PM EDT until June 14 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Essex County in northeastern Massachusetts... Northeastern Norfolk County in eastern Massachusetts... Suffolk County in eastern Massachusetts... Southeastern Middlesex County in northeastern Massachusetts... North central Plymouth County in southeastern Massachusetts... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 727 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Dedham, or over Milton, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Boston, Cambridge, Quincy, Lynn, Newton, Somerville, Waltham, Malden, Brookline, Medford, Weymouth, Revere, Peabody, Arlington, Everett, Salem, Billerica, Beverly, Woburn and Braintree. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
